channel.title: No one can connect to my server
channel.description: Ok so, I created my server about 1 months ago and I'm in the process of making it, So I released the client to just one of my best friends to test it. he can play. He was playing for about 2 weeks. And now for some reason he can't connect at all only I can connect, and when my friends try to connect, when the server run.bat is running, only I can connect and they just get Error connecting to server. Someone please help, :|

item.title: No one can connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @petethecoder petethecoder
item.description:
@petethecoder wrote:

I always say that hahahaha. Just how I say it. Sorta an inside joke. But I just portforwarded again, and still no one can connect. I swear if my computer is trolling me and it’s something small. I went to my windows firewall, Added port, went to the 192.168.1.2 <-- default ip to get to the page. & I added in all my ip’s and everything. But still no connect from other player. I’m teamviewing my desktop at home the one I run the server on, and my friend next to me is connecting to it.

Read full topic
item.source: No one can connect to my server

item.title: No one can connect to my server

item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“petethecoder, post:1, topic:426573”]about 1 months ago[/quote]Singular and plural at the same time, mindfuck.

item.title: No one can connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @petethecoder petethecoder
item.description:
@petethecoder wrote:

fuck. my mom restarts the router alot because she plays COD and she said it suppose of heals her lagg ongame. dangit, portforwarding is annoying. looks like im teamviewing my own computer for tonight -__-

Read full topic
item.source: No one can connect to my server

item.title: No one can connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

when your router resets, or gets turned off, your ip address changes… so everytime your router turns off, you have to portforward again.

Read full topic
item.source: No one can connect to my server

item.title: No one can connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @petethecoder petethecoder
item.description:
@petethecoder wrote:

Guys, I have portforwarded. But for some reason I think my port randomly changed, Because my friend connected too my server a week ago. with the same client i have now, and now. when I run the server. only I can connect. and no one else can. But when I go to canyouseeme.org , the port i use is PC Anywhere right? & Not Remote Desktop

Read full topic
item.source: No one can connect to my server

item.title: No one can connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

ugh, I hate portforwarding with Utorrent… the first time I every attempted to portforward was with that and the server’s uptime was so unpredictable… I suggest you portforwarding through your router and not use Utorrent.

Read full topic
